sub_topic: Prove that the empty set is a subset of every set.
message_1: Let A = {1, 2, 3, 4} and B = {}. Determine if the empty set is a subset of set A and set B.
message_2: The empty set, denoted as âˆ…, is a subset of every set, including set A and set B. This is because the empty set contains no elements, and therefore, all of its elements (none) are also in set A and set B. So, the empty set is a subset of both set A and set B.
